pages.text: The scoped crossbow is the result of the ever increasing demand for higher accuracy and longer range in ranged weaponry. When a telescope is applied to a crossbow via a smithing table, it grants the ability to zoom in on your foes, allowing you to go for precision shots.

Additionally, arrows fired from a scoped crossbow exhibit a peculiar property: they do not seem affected by the force of gravity, allowing them to fly much further. Science currently has no explanation for this phenomenon"
